so in front of me I have a large

we want a kind of a rapid simmer because
we're gonna steam these sweet potatoes
now you could do one of two things you
could either steam the sweet potatoes or
you could roast them in the oven the
reason we're not boiling them is because
we don't want them to become waterlogged
because in the end if you boil sweet
potatoes what could happen is you're
gonna end up with maybe a waterlogged
kind of bland mashed sweet potato so
steaming or roasting are really great
methods for making a mashed sweet potato
now I'm cutting my potatoes into even
size pieces you want to make sure that
whenever you're cooking anything any

all together that you're cutting the
pieces evenly this will ensure that the
cooking is even as well and once I get

that you cut they'll take anywhere
between 15 to 25 minutes you want to
make sure that these are gonna be nice

while this is going I'm going to heat up

add half a cup of half-and-half now I'm
using half in half because it has more

but if you were counting your calories

even use a coconut milk would be great
if you did

so if you wanted sweet potatoes that

kind of something similar to what you

where you would rice potatoes and you'd
